scenario:
The infrastructure market in Italy is forecasted to grow by USD 24 billion during 2024-2029, accelerating at a CAGR of 4.2% during the forecast period. The market is driven by growing urbanization, increased investments in infrastructure, and increase in exports and investors. The study identifies the growing e-commerce industry, government plans for infrastructure development, and emergence of automation in construction industry as key drivers of market growth. 

The market is segmented by application into transportation, social, utilities, and manufacturing, and by revenue stream into direct investment, indirect investment, and others. A robust vendor analysis is provided, covering around 25 vendors including ABB, Accenture PLC, ACS Actividades de Construccion Y Servicios SA, and others. The report also includes information on upcoming trends and challenges that will influence market growth. 

Key companies mentioned in the report include Atlantica Sustainable Infrastructure plc, Bank of Italy, Euronext N.V., and Siemens AG. The report is available at https://www.researchandmarkets.com/r/g54ind.
